name: Dashmachine
short_description: Customizable personal dashboard for organizing links and services.
description: Customizable personal dashboard for organizing links and services. Dashmachine is a self-hosted application focused on dashboard, organization, monitoring, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Dashmachine on your home server to customizable personal dashboard for organizing links and services without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Dashmachine to manage your dashboard workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
